sentences.sContent: Gnomeo and Juliet is directed and co-written by animation veteran Kelly Asbury, who makes no apologies to William Shakespeare or to the bard's, perhaps, most malleable tale.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gnomeo and Juliet is directed and co-written by animation veteran Kelly Asbury, who makes no apologies to William Shakespeare or to the bard's, perhaps, most malleable tale.
sentences.sCn: 《格诺米欧和朱丽叶》的导演兼编剧是动漫老手凯利.阿斯博瑞，他对莎翁和古代的吟游诗人没有一丝愧疚之情，这大概是最具改编潜力的故事了。
